title: When the world’s largest battery power plant caught fire, toxic metals rained down – wetlands captured the fallout
description: A fire at Vistra's battery energy storage facility in Moss Landing, California, released heavy metal debris, affecting air and soil quality.
content: A fire at Vistra's battery energy storage facility in Moss Landing, California, released heavy metal debris, affecting air and soil quality.
